name: 1-Shot Bulletproof Mafia
description: Protected from one kill during the night.

name: Abductor
description: Abduct 1 player per game at night. They are informed of being held hostage. If you are voted out, the hostage dies.

name: Accuser
description: Choose someone each night. They are automatically the last person on the block

name: Arms Dealer
description: Arm 1 person per game. That night, they unknowingly kill everyone they visit—their real action is roleblocked.

name: Blackmailer
description: Blackmail 2 people per game. They are told that they must claim a town role of your choice that day. They may claim nothing, but die next night if they claim another role or claim blackmail that day.

name: Bodysnatcher
description: Pick 2 people per night. If either dies before the next night, they are revealed as the other's role.

name: Bootlegger
description: Roleblock someone each night.

name: Consigliere
description: Learn the role of one player each night.

name: Cultist
description: The two closest players on either side of you appear guilty.
author: Wabbs

name: Devil on My Shoulder
description: Visit someone each night to make them unknowingly vote for the same person as you the following day.
author: Wubbles

name: Enforcer
description: If you are the only one to vote for someone during the day, they die next night. This happens in addition to the mafia kill and is infallible.

name: Escape Artist
description: If at least 1 other Mafia is alive, you survive being voted out—this is announced. Each time you are voted out, other than Day 1, roleblock a player that night.
author: Nancy Sun

name: Extortionist
description: On night 3 or later, visit 1 person per game. If town-sided, they lose their role and become a Traitor.

name: Fireproof Mafia
description: Immune to being burned.

name: Framer
description: Frame someone each night. The framed player is informed of this. If they are on the block, they die instead of whoever had majority vote.
author: Nancy Sun

name: Frontman
description: Appear innocent until your 1st kill, which is invisible.

name: Gambler
description: Can shoot another mafia member to become 1-shot bulletproof, innocent, or invisible (this counts as the Mafia kill that night).
author: Webbs

name: Godfather
description: Appear innocent to all guilt checks.

name: Gravedigger
description: When you kill, if the victim doesn't survive, see their role at the end of the night; it isn't announced.

name: Hangman
description: While you live, two people get voted out each day and the block is one person larger. If there is a tie for the second vote, there is no second kill.

name: Hitman
description: Invisible.

name: Hooker
description: Silence one player each night.

name: Igniter
description: Twice per game, turn the Mafia kill into a burn.

name: Illuminati
description: Wakes with the Masons in addition to the Mafia.
author: Craig Santo

name: Illusionist
description: Visit two players. Any visit on one of those players instead visits the other player this night.

name: King
description: Once per game can silence everyone for the following day. 1-shot bulletproof

name: Lawyer
description: Defend someone each night. The next day, if there are 3 or more people who don't vote for the client, the client survives even if they still have majority vote. If the client is voted out, you die too. The other Mafia don't know your role. Do not wake with them.

name: Madman
description: Each night, if you don't do the Mafia kill, wake up separately for an extra kill.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Mafia
description: Normal Mafia.

name: Mastermind
description: Each night, if you don't kill, you may change 1 mafia member's role. The change occurs next night. No duplicates.

name: Mobber
description: While you live, voting is done with eyes closed.

name: Seeker
description: Each night, temporarily gain the ability of the player last voted out.

name: Scenic
description: Choose a player each night. You appear to visit them (and only them) even if you kill someone else.

name: Siren
description: Choose someone each night. If they visit someone, they instead visit you. 1-shot bulletproof.

name: Sniper
description: If you kill, you visit the victim tonight but they die next night.

name: Spy
description: At the start of the game, you are told a role that is not in this game.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Strongman
description: Make one of your kills infallible per game with your strength.

name: Tactician
description: If the Mafia try to kill someone already being targeted by a killing role, you wake up again and can choose to kill someone else. The same person performs the kill.

name: Traitor
description: Does not wake with the other members of the Mafia at night. The other Mafia members know there is a Traitor in the game, but not who that player is.

name: Traitor+
description: 1-shot bulletproof traitor. When 3 players remain, you get 1 shot.

name: Admirer
description: Know the Serial Killer (SK); win with them. The SK knows that there is an Admirer but not who they are. Can kill once per night if the SK dies.

name: Agoraphobe
description: Infinite bulletproof. Visit one player each night. That player dies if no one else visits them. Win with the Waterboarder and know if they are in the game.

name: Amnesiac
description: Each night, see all dead roles. Once per game, pick one to become (announced "The Amnesiac remembered a role"). 1-shot bulletproof before picking.

name: Apprentice
description: Once per game, pick a Master (announced "The Apprentice has a master"). See the Master's role and any relevant info. Win with them and become their role if they die. 1-shot bulletproof before picking.

name: Arsonist
description: Each night either douse someone with gasoline or burn all doused players. 1-shot bulletproof.

name: Backstabber
description: 1-shot bulletproof, fireproof, innocent. Wake with the Mafia, appear normal Mafia. If you perform the kill, it does not happen. If the Mafia have won, regain bulletproof and become a serial killer.

name: Barista
description: 1-shot bulletproof. Kill 1 person per night. The person you visit is silenced the next day if they live.

name: Doomsayer
description: 1-shot bulletproof. Each night, the person you last voted for burns to death if they survived the vote. This is not a visit.

name: Douser
description: Know the Arsonist; win with them. The Arsonist knows that there is a Douser but not who they are. Douse one player per night. Can ignite ONCE if the Arsonist dies.
author: Alyssa

name: Herbalist
description: Poison someone each night. They know that they were poisoned, and will die the next night unless saved. Win with the Arsonist.
author: Ben

name: Infiltrator
description: At the start of the game choose a faction to win with. See who else is in that faction unless choosing Town.
author: Ben

name: Jester
description: Win with any side if voted out. If voted out, the mod may or may not give you 1 infallible revenge kill that night.

name: Joker
description: 1-shot bulletproof. Kill 1 person per night. Once per game, if on the block, may pick someone to take your place before voting.

name: Matchmaker
description: Infinite bulletproof. Each night, visit two players to match them. If a matched player is shot, everyone matched with them is shot too. Does not go through bulletproof. Can shoot once per game.

name: Monk
description: Reflect all visits to you (including kills). Win with any side if all killing roles die.

name: Pirate
description: 1-shot bulletproof. On odd-numbered nights, roleblock 1 person. On even-numbered nights, kill 2 people.

name: Serial Killer
description: Kill someone each night. The first night choose either: infinite bulletproof (thumbs up) or 1-shot bulletproof, innocent, and invisible (thumbs down).

name: Waterboarder
description: Each night, roleblock a player and see their role, and kill another. Win with the Agoraphobe and know if they are in the game.

name: Zombie
description: 1-shot bulletproof. Zombify someone each night. That player knows that they are now a zombie. They lose their previous role and win with the original zombie. All zombies die if the original zombie dies. Zombification can be blocked by saving roles or cured by the witch.
author: Wimblemim

name: Gaslighter
description: You don't know how to read, never did.
author: Lemon

name: 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie
description: Protected from one kill during the night.

name: 1-Shot Vigilante
description: Once per game can kill a player during the night.

name: 2-Shot Vigilante
description: Twice per game can kill a player during the night.

name: Acolyte
description: Know the Sage. Become the Sage if the Sage dies.

name: Arbitrator
description: Once per game at night, can pick who is on the block the next day.

name: Bard
description: Each night visit a player preventing any kills they perform that night.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Bartender
description: Each night visit a player, roleblocking them.

name: Blacksmith
description: Replenish the bulletproof of anyone who visits you, if it was lost.

name: Blind Medium
description: Visit someone each night. The mod points right or left based on the direction of the nearest guilty player from the target, excluding the target. If the directions tie, the mod picks arbitrarily.

name: Bodyguard
description: Visit 1 player per night. All visits to them go to you instead. 1-shot bulletproof.
author: Chris Colen

name: Bookkeeper
description: Pick someone each night. The next night, you will see whom they visited and who visited them on the night you chose them.

name: Businessman
description: Always framed, but can motion for a reblock while on the block. Must get at least 5 minutes to defend, unless you end early.
author: Wubble

name: Busdriver
description: Swap 2 players' seats per night—announced in the morning.

name: Cameraman
description: Cannot die by any means except by being voted out. Learn who every person visited each night. Permanently silenced. Must keep their hands in the shape of a frame all game.
author: Wobble

name: Closed
description: A game in which no roles are announced initially, and roles are revealed as people die.

name: Confirmable
description: A role that can prove itself. For example, the Old Man with Shotgun is confirmable since no one else can kill during the day.

name: Conspiracy Theorist
description: Once per game can ask the mod three questions at night; one will be answered truthfully, the other two will be answered falsely.
author: Wooms

name: Constable
description: Tip your hat to someone else and say "Constable" in view of the mod before the block forms. If that person is on the block and survives, they are saved next night.

name: Coroner
description: Visit a person. If they die find out what role their killer was.
author: Chris Colen
comment: Created as a fake claim during a game. Initial name was necromancer.

name: Counter Claim
description: When a second person claims the same thing as someone else. In normal games there is only one of each role (except mason) so when two people claim the same role one must be lying.

name: Deputy
description: Take over as Sheriff the night after the Sheriff dies.

name: Doctor
description: Save a person each night. Cannot save the same person two nights in a row.

name: Eavesdropper
description: You may open your eyes at night—if other roles do this, it is cheating! If an evil player sees you with your eyes open, you die infallibly.

name: Electrician
description: The first person of the game to visit you dies instantly.

name: Executioner
description: The block is one person larger. Choose someone each night: they become the last person on the block. If the vote ties, your choice dies.

name: Fake Claim
description: When someone claims a role incorrectly.  For example, a member of the mafia may fake claim that they are town sided.

name: Fireproof Townie
description: Immune to being burned.

name: Final Girl
description: 1-shot bulletproof, fireproof. If the Mafia would win by numerical majority, the Town wins instead if you are alive.

name: General
description: While you live, all roles are mortally wounded instead of killed. They die after the vote instead of in the morning. Mortally wounded roles are treated as dead for win conditions.

name: Glass Cannon
description: Each night, if no one visits you, you may kill 1 person. Die if anyone visits you.

name: Golem
description: Can only die by fire or vote. Visit anyone who dies.

name: Gossiper
description: Visit two other people each night to learn if they win with the same team.
author: Wilt

name: Grave Robber
description: Learns the roles of players that are killed by the gravedigger
author: lmn

name: Hard Claim
description: When someone says their exact role to everyone.

name: Humanist Vampire
description: Drain the blood of 1 person per night, roleblocking them. A person drained twice dies.

name: Hunter
description: 1-shot bulletproof, 1-shot vigilante. Can make 1 person per game 1-shot bulletproof.

name: Information Role
description: Roles whose night actions gain information about other players.

name: Jailor
description: Jails one player per night, roleblocking and protecting them for the night. Cannot jail themself.

name: Librarian
description: The closest living person on each side of you is protected at night. Each night, see if anyone was doused.
author: Wibbs

name: Lobbyist
description: Each night, you may nominate 1 person. The mod announces that they start the day with 1 nomination, but will not say who nominated them.

name: Mason
description: Wake up the first night to find out who all of the other masons are.

name: Mason Avenger
description: Wake with the Masons. Each time a Mason dies, you can kill once at night.

name: Mass Claim
description: Everyone publicly announces their role.

name: Mathematician
description: See how many visits occur each night.

name: Mayor
description: Break tie votes in favor of this player's vote

name: Metagaming
description: Using info that game characters wouldn't have access to, like hearing the mod stand next to someone and concluding that they wake up, using the night length to guess roles, making inferences based on mod fails, etc. This is discouraged.

name: Milkman
description: Give milk to a player each night. The milk does nothing, but is announced in the morning.

name: Miller
description: Appear guilty to all guilt checks.

name: Miner
description: 1-shot bulletproof. While bulletproof, see everyone who visits you.

name: Mod Fail
description: When the mod makes a mistake. Everyone may have to go to sleep while it is corrected. The prevalence of mod fails shockingly has an inverse correlation to the amount of time till sunrise.

name: Neighbor
description: Learn if either of the two people next to you wake up at night (you get a thumbs up or thumbs down). Can visit either of them to learn if THEY visited anyone that night.

name: Old Man with Shotgun
description: Once per game, can kill a player during the day before voting. Ignores bulletproof.

name: Open
description: A game in which all of the roles in the game are announced at the beginning, but roles are not revealed as people die.

name: Oracle
description: Visits one player per night. When the Oracle dies, the most recently visited player's role is revealed.

name: Paparazzo
description: Pick a player each night to see a photo of them during their night action.

name: Paranoid Townie
description: If a player visits you during the night, kill them.

name: Politician
description: If voted out unanimously, is revived the next day with the ability to check one player per night to see if they are Town. Dies as usual if not unanimous.

name: Priest
description: Twice per game, protect a person. You can use multiple saves in the same night.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Prime Minister
description: Once per game, after someone is voted out, "veto" the vote before night. They don't die and their role isn't revealed.

name: Prophet
description: Know one role that is in the game (aside from your own).
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Psychic
description: See the number of guilty players left each night.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Clairvoyant
description: Before each morning, see who will die. You may save one person per game.
author: Ben

name: Queen
description: Know if there is a King/Jester in the game. Can't be silenced by the King. 1-shot bulletproof.

name: Quick Block
description: When players rapidly nominate and second the block, exploiting the fact that it "locks" when full.

name: Revenant
description: Can feign death once per game, resurrected the next day. Pick a Town role to be revealed as by the mod (the Town can still lose while you feign death).
author: Werbs

name: Revisionist
description: Choose one person each night. If that person dies next round they will be the ONLY death that round.
author: Wulbs

name: Rich
description: Joins all games.

name: Sage
description: Non-killing visits to you are reflected.

name: Samurai
description: Infinite-shot vigilante. If you are the sole cause of an innocent death, you die.

name: Saving Role
description: Any role that can prevent a death from occuring.

name: Seer
description: Every night learn if there was a guilty player on the block the previous day. Unblockable.
author: Nancy Sun

name: Servant
description: Aid someone each night. Their action is infallible.

name: Sheriff
description: Guilt-check 1 person per night. See thumbs up if they are guilty (not town); thumbs down if innocent.

name: Shopkeeper
description: Anyone visiting you at night is protected.

name: Shrink
description: Each night visit someone. If they are 3rd party, they become a basic Townie.

name: Sleepwalker
description: Visit a random player each night, without knowing whom.

name: Soldier
description: Starting at 0, gain 1 use of the Veteran ability each time anyone visits you. It can be used the night after you gain it.

name: Night Crawler
description: Visit one person at random each night. If you are visited by an evil role, learn that role.

name: Sleuth
description: Every night, learn the total number of guilty players who voted for the person last voted out.
author: Wumms

name: Soft Claim
description: When someone hints about their role, without explicitly stating it.  For example, someone might say that they are "weak healing" or "strong investigative".

name: Super Citizen
description: Everyone privately tells their roles to this person. Usually someone who is confirmed Town, they will likely organize all Town actions based on their knowledge.

name: Super Closed
description: A game which may have non standard rules, roles, and win conditions.  Often themed, these games are chaotic and take longer than normal games.  Roles are not announced at the begining, and usually are revealed as people die.

name: Super Mason
description: While you are alive, the other Masons cannot die.

name: Tinker
description: Once per game, choose someone. They regain all uses of their abilities and bulletproof. You can target yourself only once. 1-shot bulletproof.

name: Town Crier
description: Twice per game, visit someone else to let them use their ability twice tonight unless it has limited uses.

name: Town Killing Role
description: Any town sided role that can kill.

name: Townie
description: Normal Town.

name: Tracker
description: Track one player each night, seeing whom they visit.

name: Trapper
description: Set a trap on 1 player per game. It lasts until someone other than you visits the trapped player; then it goes off, killing everyone other than you who visited them that night.

name: Tree-Hat
description: 1-shot bulletproof. While bulletproof, appear guilty and visit one person each night to determine if they wake up.

name: Veteran
description: Once per game during the night, "keep watch", killing all players that visit you this night.

name: Virgin
description: Once per game during the night, "perform the ritual", preventing all kills that night.
author: Chris Colen

name: Watcher
description: Watches one player, seeing everyone who visits them.

name: Witch
description: Visit someone each night. If they would die, save them. If not, kill them.
author: Devin Lehmacher

name: Bulletproof
description: Survive being shot, but not other forms of death like poison, fire, zombification, and the vote. Some roles can take a finite number of shots before dying; some are infinite bulletproof.

name: Burn
description: Death by fire. Mods usually say someone "burned to death" to distinguish it from other kills. Fireproof roles survive.

name: Guilt Check
description: Checking if others are innocent/guilty Sheriff, Deputy, Seer, etc. Town roles are innocent and others are guilty, with some exceptions.

name: Infallible
description: Infallible actions ALWAYS take effect regardless of other actions. For example, they are not stopped by roleblocks and can't be redirected to another target, and the target can't be protected from the effect.

name: Invisible
description: Appear to visit no one. You still appear to wake up, but visit-tracking roles don't see your visit, Neighbor sees that you don't visit, Mathematician can't count your visit, etc.

name: Mob Rule
description: Voting when 3 people are alive. Living players shut their eyes and the mod says their names one at a time. Living players raise their hand when the name of whomever they want to vote for is said. 3 consecutive ties begin night.

name: No Game Talk
description: People can't discuss the game (e.g. their or someone else's role, actions, etc.) but may discuss other things. Living players are subject to this at night and dead players are always subject to this.

name: No Talking During Defenses
description: "You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say is not allowed because it is my defense." At any point in their defense, players may demand silence.

name: Roleblock
description: An action is blocked. Info roles know if they are blocked e.g. X gesture from the mod. Other roles do not know if they are blocked; the mod just ignores their action. Blocked roles visit no one. If 2 roleblockers block each other, ignore all visits from both.

name: Silence
description: Different from No Game Talk in that silenced players can't talk at all, though gestures/writing are OK. Some roles can silence others. Mods may silence people in extreme cases.

name: Visit
description: Perform an action on another player, like killing, saving, dousing, etc.
